FuncDef: This command configures a TCA for the counter capturing hits for the specified SCTP filter PPID entry. An SCTP filter entry TCA can be created for traffic generated from the subscriber side of AA (from-sub) or for traffic generated from the network toward the AA subscriber (to-sub). Thecreatekeyword is mandatory when creating a TCA.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the SCTP filter PPID entry identifier. Values-1 to 255.
Specifies the traffic direction. Values-from-sub, to-sub.
Keyword used to create the TCA.
